name: route-mapper
description: Route Mapper - Generate Rails Style Routing & RESTful Routes

scripts.test-ci: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should --reporter spec --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-cov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require should --reporter dot --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js

author: Fangdun Cai <cfddream@gmail.com>
